More than four years have passed, but the game remains popular today: various tournaments and competitions gather an audience of millions from different countries.

The main idea of ‚Äã‚Äãthe game is to conduct a counter-terrorist operation in a separate location. The operation involves terrorists and special forces. The terrorists must detonate the bomb, hold the hostages or snap the special forces, and the special forces must prevent the terrorists from carrying out their plan.
